verbose_text: Moreover, consistent with the hypothesis that Txl1 and Trx1 independently repress Pap1 dependent gene expression, the levels of gst2 +, srx1 +, and obr1 + mRNA were all substantially higher in unstressed Deltatrx1Deltatxl1 cells compared with either single mutant (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Txl1 and Trx1 independently repress Pap1-dependent gene expression, the levels of gst2 + , srx1
